channel.title: Changing Levels on Cheezscape
channel.description:
Can someone give me a detailed guide to changing the levels of your characters on Cheezscape and also how to spawn or put certains items into a bank.
Thanks
Adam[br][size=1]Posted at: September 04, 2006, 03:33:10 PM[/size][hr]BUMP anyone :|

item.title: Changing Levels on Cheezscape
item.dc:creator: @Mod_BaldwinC Mod BaldwinC
item.description:
@Mod_BaldwinC wrote:

Cool? I first time poster talking about a server… wow… Anyways
I dont think you can altar levels I tried. But if this is your server here add this code:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("maxout") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(48000000, 0); addSkillXP(48000000, 1); addSkillXP(48000000, 2); addSkillXP(48000000, 3); addSkillXP(48000000, 4); addSkillXP(48000000, 5); addSkillXP(48000000, 6); addSkillXP(48000000, 7); addSkillXP(48000000, 8); addSkillXP(48000000, 9); addSkillXP(48000000, 10); addSkillXP(48000000, 11); addSkillXP(48000000, 12); addSkillXP(48000000, 13); addSkillXP(48000000, 14); addSkillXP(48000000, 15); addSkillXP(48000000, 16); addSkillXP(48000000, 17); addSkillXP(48000000, 18); addSkillXP(48000000, 19); addSkillXP(48000000, 20); addSkillXP(48000000, 21); addSkillXP(48000000, 22); addSkillXP(48000000, 23); addSkillXP(48000000, 24); sendMessage("You have altared your levels!"); }
*This aint my code.
Also if you want you can change the xp to whatever you want.
For Spawning,
type
::pickup “item id” “item amount”
(i.e. ::pickup 0995 200000) that is money
And well you can add that to your bank
if you have Update 80 of cheezscape go to your emotes and click bank -OR- if you admin type ::bank

Read full topic
